name: Arcane Old Texts
description: A dark theme for Astral Codex Ten, the new blog of Scott Alexander, long may he reign!
additional_info:
1.0 (Jan 25 2021): Initial release. Known issue with light-colored dummy content visible before posts/comments load.

1.1 (Feb 3 2021): Fixed issue with dummy content (thanks to /u/Elodes on reddit!)

1.2 (Feb 22 2021): Added CSS for the new predictions boxes!

1.3 (Mar 12 2021): Fixed invisible commenter name color, added top margin to comment reply box
